title: At least 3 killed, 8 injured in knife attack at German festival, police say
content: The victims had been attending a festival in the western German city of Solingen. Police are still searching for the attacker and have not ruled out terrorism as a motive.
summary: The victims had been attending a festival in the western German city of Solingen. Police are still searching for the attacker and have not ruled out terrorism as a motive.

title: Italy opens manslaughter investigation into Sicily yacht sinking
content: Italian prosecutors say no suspect has been idenitifed in the investigation into the deaths of seven people after Monday’s sinking of the Bayesian.
summary: Italian prosecutors say no suspect has been idenitifed in the investigation into the deaths of seven people after Monday’s sinking of the Bayesian.

title: Hamas sends delegates to Cairo as beleaguered cease-fire talks set to resume
content: Cease-fire negotiations are due to get underway in Egypt this weekend. Hamas said its representatives will travel to Cairo for the talks but will not participate.
summary: Cease-fire negotiations are due to get underway in Egypt this weekend. Hamas said its representatives will travel to Cairo for the talks but will not participate.

title: Ukraine keeps crossing Russia’s red lines. Putin keeps blinking.
content: Ukraine’s punch through Russian defenses in the first foreign invasion since World War II has laid bare Moscow’s apparently illusory red lines.
summary: Ukraine’s punch through Russian defenses in the first foreign invasion since World War II has laid bare Moscow’s apparently illusory red lines.

title: Europe’s most dangerous volcano rumbles, and Italians weigh the risk
content: As the Phlegraean Fields volcano awakens, scientists debate the peril posed by a monster thought to have caused the most violent eruption of pre-historic Europe.
summary: As the Phlegraean Fields volcano awakens, scientists debate the peril posed by a monster thought to have caused the most violent eruption of pre-historic Europe.

title: Australia offers U.S. a vast new military launchpad in China conflict
content: Australia is expanding its northern military bases, with U.S. support, to counter China's growing threat. Critics quip it’s become the “51st state.”
summary: Australia is expanding its northern military bases, with U.S. support, to counter China's growing threat. Critics quip it’s become the “51st state.”

title: South Koreans once chipped in for fighter jets. Now, they make their own.
content: The U.S. Phantom F-4 fighter jet, which South Korea has just retired from use, acts as a metaphor for the countries’ security alliance. It’s also a hell of a ride.
summary: The U.S. Phantom F-4 fighter jet, which South Korea has just retired from use, acts as a metaphor for the countries’ security alliance. It’s also a hell of a ride.

title: U.S. debates support for Ukraine’s surprise offensive into Russia
content: Caught unaware by Ukraine’s military incursion into Russia, the Biden administration is debating whether to help Kyiv’s forces hold the sliver of territory they now occupy.
summary: Caught unaware by Ukraine’s military incursion into Russia, the Biden administration is debating whether to help Kyiv’s forces hold the sliver of territory they now occupy.

title: U.S. calls Lopez Obrador reforms ‘major risk’ to democracy; Mexico protests
content: The Mexican president Lopez Obrador rejects U.S. criticism about his radical judicial reform. The dispute comes as the U.S. is relying on Mexico to contain migration during a presidential campaign.
summary: The Mexican president Lopez Obrador rejects U.S. criticism about his radical judicial reform. The dispute comes as the U.S. is relying on Mexico to contain migration during a presidential campaign.

title: U.S. insists Gaza cease-fire deal is close, but diplomats are skeptical
content: U.S. officials have insisted that negotiations for a cease-fire in Gaza were making headway, while glossing over intense disagreements between Israel and Hamas.
summary: U.S. officials have insisted that negotiations for a cease-fire in Gaza were making headway, while glossing over intense disagreements between Israel and Hamas.

title: India’s Modi visits Ukraine, urges Zelensky to hold peace talks
content: The Indian prime minister’s trip to the Ukrainian capital, Kyiv, came after his visit to Moscow last month, which was sharply criticized by Zelensky.
summary: The Indian prime minister’s trip to the Ukrainian capital, Kyiv, came after his visit to Moscow last month, which was sharply criticized by Zelensky.

title: Last chance to escape: Ukrainians flee Pokrovsk as Russians advance
content: As Ukrainian soldiers struggle to stave off waves of Russian fighters, civilians flee Pokrovsk, a city once thought far from the front line.
summary: As Ukrainian soldiers struggle to stave off waves of Russian fighters, civilians flee Pokrovsk, a city once thought far from the front line.

title: Icelandic volcano eruption sends lava flowing in visual spectacle
content: The eruption, the sixth on the Reykjanes Peninsula since December, created a glow that attracted attention but did not pose a threat to residents.
summary: The eruption, the sixth on the Reykjanes Peninsula since December, created a glow that attracted attention but did not pose a threat to residents.

title: How many hostages are still in Gaza since Hamas attack on Israel? What to know.
content: Israel estimates some 116 hostages held by Hamas have been released or freed; 71 are believed still to be alive in Gaza. Here’s what we know.
summary: Israel estimates some 116 hostages held by Hamas have been released or freed; 71 are believed still to be alive in Gaza. Here’s what we know.

title: Final body found in Sicily yacht wreckage is Hannah Lynch, official says
content: The 18-year-old daughter of British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch was the last passenger missing from Monday’s sinking of the Bayesian.
summary: The 18-year-old daughter of British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch was the last passenger missing from Monday’s sinking of the Bayesian.

title: Kamala Harris spotlights her mom and dad in DNC speech: About her parents
content: Kamala Harris’s DNC speech credited her mom Shyamala Gopalan and dad Donald Harris, who immigrated from India and Jamaica respectively, with shaping her identity.
summary: Kamala Harris’s DNC speech credited her mom Shyamala Gopalan and dad Donald Harris, who immigrated from India and Jamaica respectively, with shaping her identity.

title: Harris strikes balance in pointed DNC remarks on war
content: The Democratic presidential nominee said she would “always stand up for Israel’s right to defend itself,” but also directly addressed the suffering in Gaza.
summary: The Democratic presidential nominee said she would “always stand up for Israel’s right to defend itself,” but also directly addressed the suffering in Gaza.

title: The strategy behind Ukraine’s move into Russia
content: In recent weeks, Ukraine launched a surprise attack into Russia, taking land and capturing Russian prisoners of war. Today, The Post’s Ukraine bureau chief, Isabelle Khurshudyan, explains how Ukraine’s incursion may change the trajectory of the war.
summary: In recent weeks, Ukraine launched a surprise attack into Russia, taking land and capturing Russian prisoners of war. Today, The Post’s Ukraine bureau chief, Isabelle Khurshudyan, explains how Ukraine’s incursion may change the trajectory of the war.

title: As Hezbollah and Israel step up attacks, ailing Lebanon fears the worst
content: In Lebanon’s impoverished south, where Hezbollah holds sway and attacks have been most intense, Syrian refugees have borne the brunt of the recent violence.
summary: In Lebanon’s impoverished south, where Hezbollah holds sway and attacks have been most intense, Syrian refugees have borne the brunt of the recent violence.

title: Mike Lynch’s body is fifth found in yacht wreckage; daughter is last missing
content: The body of Lynch, 59, was recovered from the wreckage of the Bayesian, according to an Italian government official. The Bayesian yacht sank in a storm this week.
summary: The body of Lynch, 59, was recovered from the wreckage of the Bayesian, according to an Italian government official. The Bayesian yacht sank in a storm this week.

title: Ukrainians cheer push into Russia but fear it comes at the cost of the east
content: As Moscow’s forces gain ground in Ukraine’s east, some are questioning why Kyiv is devoting so many resources to taking Russian land rather than defending its own.
summary: As Moscow’s forces gain ground in Ukraine’s east, some are questioning why Kyiv is devoting so many resources to taking Russian land rather than defending its own.

title: Israeli military says recovered hostages’ bodies had gunshot wounds
content: Six bodies of Israeli hostages being held by Hamas in Gaza were recovered on Tuesday from a tunnel below Khan Younis.
summary: Six bodies of Israeli hostages being held by Hamas in Gaza were recovered on Tuesday from a tunnel below Khan Younis.

title: Russia opens case against CNN reporter who covered Kursk incursion
content: The country’s security service said the journalist would be placed on Russia’s wanted list. Under Russian law, the maximum penalty for illegally crossing the border is five years in prison.
summary: The country’s security service said the journalist would be placed on Russia’s wanted list. Under Russian law, the maximum penalty for illegally crossing the border is five years in prison.

title: Second-largest diamond ever, 2,492 carats, unearthed in Botswana
content: Lucara Diamond discovered the world's second largest diamond in Botswana's Karowe mine using Mega Diamond Recovery X-ray technology.
summary: Lucara Diamond discovered the world's second largest diamond in Botswana's Karowe mine using Mega Diamond Recovery X-ray technology.

title: New arrests in smuggling of migrants who died in a Texas truck
content: Guatemalan officials announced the dismantling of a smuggling ring behind the deadliest incident of its kind on U.S. soil, in which 53 migrants died.
summary: Guatemalan officials announced the dismantling of a smuggling ring behind the deadliest incident of its kind on U.S. soil, in which 53 migrants died.

title: How many women presidents and prime ministers have served in your lifetime?
content: The U.S. has never had a woman president, but it’s far from alone. Enter your birthday to find out the number of women who have led around the world.
summary: The U.S. has never had a woman president, but it’s far from alone. Enter your birthday to find out the number of women who have led around the world.
